statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'camera';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_type DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type IN ('laptop', 'printer') ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Laptop' ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Printer%' AND equipment_type = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_price FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE purchase_price > 1000
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM EquipmentInventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT maintenance_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive'
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM EquipmentInventory
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory LIMIT 10
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_price FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_price DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%computer%'
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, location FROM EquipmentInventory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC

SELECT MaintenanceSchedule.maintenance_id, MaintenanceSchedule.maintenance_date, EquipmentInventory.equipment_name FROM MaintenanceSchedule INNER JOIN EquipmentInventory ON MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id = EquipmentInventory.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity, category FROM Equipment WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, frequency, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE frequency = 'Weekly';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, category, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, name, category, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician, notes FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%excavator%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM equipment_inventory;

SELECT e.equipment_name, s.maintenance_type, l.maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory e INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule s ON e.id = s.equipment_id INNER JOIN maintenance_logs l ON s.schedule_id = l.schedule_id WHERE e.quantity > 5;

SELECT p.full_name, p.job_title, p.department, COUNT(m.schedule_id) AS total_maintenance FROM personnel p LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule m ON p.personnel_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY p.full_name ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, acquisition_date FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_description ILIKE '%repair%';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log JOIN equipment ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;
SELECT location, current_status FROM equipment_tracking WHERE current_status = 'Available' ORDER BY location ASC, tracking_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer' AND acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_name, specialty FROM technicians WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;

SELECT equipment_name, location, current_status, technician_name FROM equipment_tracking INNER JOIN technicians ON equipment_tracking.last_checked_out_by = technicians.technician_id ORDER BY location DESC;
